short_summary: Purchase of QNAP and Seagate Data Storage equipment
description: RFQ for SSC QNAP and Seagate Data Storage equipment or equivalent for Fisheries and Oceans Canada
full_summary:
### QNAP and Seagate Data Storage Equipment for Fisheries and Oceans Canada
#### Solicitation Details

* **Tender Reference:** SSC-24-00026914:T
* **Bid Closing Date:** July 30, 2024, at 14:00 ET
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Solicitation Overview
This request for proposal (RFP) is seeking QNAP and Seagate Data Storage equipment or equivalent for Fisheries and Oceans Canada. The equipment will be used to support data storage needs.

#### Key Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (excluding National Capital Region (NCR))
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **End User Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada

#### Registration and Contact Information

* Registration is open to bidders on the SSC P2P portal (https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Contact information:
	+ Javier Ventura
	+ Phone: 343 576 9329
	+ Fax: 343 576 9329
	+ Email: Not Provided
	+ Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 1B6, Canada

#### Attachments

[Download Solicitation Package](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B809CF08-F0FF-418C-99F1-C9EC2B434795)

Note: Please ensure you register as a bidder and familiarize yourself with the requirements before submitting any proposal. This RFP contains solicitations details, specifications, and requirements for the procurement of the required goods. All submission and inquiries will be processed through the SSC P2P portal.
